author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* DD allows definition of a Composite material with a reference to an undefined Material. Implement delayed resolution of such materials.
* Enable all Tracker algorithms

#### PR validation:

title: DD4hep: Referenced Material Resolution and Enabled all Tracker Algorithms
